data.name: The Dawn is Inevitable
data.detailed_description:
The Dawn is Inevitable is an interactive novel from a small indie studio Last Spring, known for the text adventure Forbidden Valley.

Unfortunately, English localization is not available at the moment, but we are trying to find means to release it as soon as possible. Thank you for your attention!

The mysterious stranger named Victor is forced to lie low in a place called Rassvet. This is a village hidden in the Chazytchir Valley beyond the ridges of the Sayan Mountains.



During the long Siberian winter, Rassvet is almost completely isolated from the outside world. During this period, it is incredibly hard to get in... but even harder to get out of there.

Of course, in a place like this, things couldn't be as easy as Victor had hoped. And he had no idea what trials would fall to his lot when he decided to go to the Rassvet.
data.about_the_game:

Unfortunately, English localization is not available at the moment, but we are trying to find means to release it as soon as possible. Thank you for your attention!

data.short_description: The Dawn is Inevitable is an interactive crime drama/neo-western novel inspired by classic RPG games. The mysterious stranger is forced to hide in the village of Rassvet, which is isolated from the outside world for the winter and keeps many secrets.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7+
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz or faster processor
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7+
  • Processor: 1.8 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
